Class ReviewListAdapter

  • com.monals.de.gyg.adapters.ReviewListAdapter

  • public class ReviewListAdapter

    RecyclerView adapter for populating the list of reviews.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  ReviewListAdapter.OnClickListenerReview
      Custom listener that handles clicks on RecyclerView items. Passes the class Review associated with the current item to the ReviewListAdapter.OnClickListenerReview.onClick function.

      ReviewViewHolder in charge of binding and displaying Review data
